title: Remez algorithm
summary: The Remez algorithm  or Remez exchange algorithm, published by Evgeny Yakovlevich Remez in 1934, is an iterative algorithm used to find simple approximations to functions, specifically, approximations by functions in a Chebyshev space that are the best in the uniform norm Lâˆž sense.[1] It is sometimes referred to as Remes algorithm or Reme algorithm.
